article_title: Students, officials seek way out of 'ridiculous' textbook prices
article_text:

article_metadata.description: One hundred textbooks were distributed to Heartland Community College students at the start of the semester at little or no cost through a book swap organized by student government.
article_metadata.author: Lenore Sobota | lsobota@pantagraph.com
